title: The Haunting of the Halloween Fair

intro.narration: As the moon rises, the Halloween fair is in full swing. The air is thick with laughter and excitement, but something sinister lurks beneath the surface.

nodes.narration: The Ferris wheel suddenly comes to a grinding halt, trapping riders high above the ground. Panic ensues as people scream for help.

choices.text: Rush to the scene and attempt to free the trapped riders.
Stay back and call for emergency services.

nodes.narration: Upon reaching the Ferris wheel, you find that the safety bars have jammed, trapping riders inside. You must act quickly to free them.

choices.text: Force the safety bars open with brute strength.
Search for a tool to pry the safety bars open.

nodes.narration: After successfully freeing the trapped riders, you notice that another ride has malfunctioned. The choice is yours on how to proceed.

choices.text: Rush to the new malfunction and attempt to fix it.
Stay with the freed riders and ensure they are safe.

nodes.narration: As you approach the malfunctioning ride, you realize that it is beyond repair. You must decide whether to evacuate the riders or attempt a risky fix.

choices.text: Attempt a risky fix to save the riders.

nodes.narration: Your risky fix fails, causing the ride to collapse. The riders are injured, and you must decide how to proceed.

choices.text: Apologize sincerely and offer assistance to the injured riders.
Blame the malfunction on external factors and leave the scene.

nodes.narration: Your actions at the Halloween fair have left a lasting impression. The consequences of your choices will be felt long after the night ends.

choices.text: Reflect on the events of the night and learn from your mistakes.
Brush off the events as a mere coincidence and move on.

nodes.narration: Your sincere apology and assistance have earned you the admiration of the injured riders. They share their gratitude and offer a reward.

choices.text: Decline the reward, stating that helping others is its own reward.

endings.title: The Hero
endings.narration: You are hailed as a hero for your quick thinking and selfless actions. The night ends on a high note, with the community praising your bravery.

endings.title: The Coward
endings.narration: Your attempts to shift blame and leave the scene have left a lasting negative impression. The community views you as reckless and uncaring.

endings.title: The Deceiver
endings.narration: Your deception has earned you a temporary victory, but the truth will eventually come out. The community remains wary of your actions.

endings.title: The Altruist
endings.narration: Your selflessness and humility have earned you the respect of the community. You are remembered as a kind and compassionate individual.
